content: tegan baby hat with topknot designed by julie taylor a simple baby hat pattern with an adorable topknot the depth of the hat can be altered slightly by adjusting the knot tie the knot a little lower if the hat is too big further up if more growing room is needed an original pattern from www lovefibres com lf020 tegan baby hat with topknot - 12 months 1 - 2 years 4-6 lbs up to 35 cm 35 - 40 cm 40 - 45 cm 45 - 48 cm head circumference up to 14 14 - 16 16 - 18 18 - 19 29 cm 30 cm 33 cm 35 cm 40 cm finished hat circumference 11½ 12 13 14 16 yarn 1 1 1 1 1 yarn 50 gram ball 50 gram ball 50 gram ball 50 gram ball 50 gram ball dk weight 55 metres 60 metres 70 metres 80 metres 90 metres 60 yards 65 yards 77 yards 88 yards 99 yards please use good quality yarn to ensure your item is safe for babies and children depending on who you are making the item for your yarn may need to be hypoallergenic merino wool silk bamboo alpaca cashmere cotton or acrylic fall into this category yarns with embedded sequins glitter tinsel or similar strands are not suitable babies and small children i have knit the sample using paintbox yarns cotton dk shade 432 seamfoam blue any yarn with a suitable fibre content that knits to the specified gauge can be used the amount of yarn needed may vary if using other yarns you will also need 3 25 mm us size 3 and 4 mm us size 6 straight knitting needles if knitting flat 3 25 mm us size 3 and 4 mm us size 6 double pointed knitting needles if knitting in the round you can also use a 23 - 40 cm 9 - 16 short shank circular needle known a shorties up to the crown shaping or a longer circular and magic loop method a stitch marker if knitting in the round tapestry needle for sewing up and weaving in yarn ends please note that needle size is a suggestion only you may need to use different size needles to match the specified gauge for reference when choosing to use a circular needle i can comfortably cast on 50 - 80 sts with a 23 cm long size 3 25 mm shortie and 80+ with a 40 cm long 3 25 cm shortie 2 lf020 tegan baby hat with topknot - copyright © julie taylor 2012 gauge/gauge 22 sts and 30 row to 10 cm 4 in stocking stitch on 4 mm us size 6 needles please take time to knit and block a gauge square that is larger
